send-invite-message: Send an invitation to a friend to tap your eggs together!
title: Tap easter egg
name: Name
waiting-egg-fellow: Waiting connection, keep this window open.
resend-invitation-note: You can resend the invitation pressing the following button. You can send the invitation only to one person
winning-egg: Your egg $1 won! Keep winning always!
losing-egg:
Oh no, your egg was owned $1 !
No worries, health comes first!
draw-egg:
Your egg $1 broke, but mine as well!
Best of health, till next year!
